name: Tim's Adventure | 3D Platformer
description:
Racoons stole your hat! Help Tim to get it back by traveling beautiful 3D world, but be careful, because there are many obstacles on the way. 

CONTROLS

WASD - For movement.

SPACE - For jump.

STORY

While Tim was chilling on his hammock, angry racoon came to steal his the most loved hat. Tim has no other choice but to go on adventure and find the stolen hat. The platforming world awaits!

GAMEPLAY

It is a fun and simple, but challenging platformer game. The controls are simple and easy to understand. Collect coins by traveling through forest full of racoons, rocks, platforms and other obstacles to unlock new hats.

FUTURE UPDATES

I'm a solo developer working years for this game. I hope I will be able to update this game and Tim will experience more adventures in his near future.

FEATURES:

• 10 challenging levels!

• Short but interesting story!

• Crazy enemies!

• Boss fight!

• 80 funny hats for your character customization!
